description: Believe it or not this is only Rich’s second shoot and this straight young personal trainer is pushing those boundaries. Since his first shoot he has become a little more muscular and definitely more toned and begins with a few muscle poses to show off his bigger arms and shoulders. Of course with all that exercise he's feeling a bit stiff, and so jumps on the bed in his fitted boxers waiting to be massaged! Feeling those warm gentle hands he thinks “Suzy” has arrived, though soon realises Zack isn’t bad at giving a massage. With a bit of oil Zack works down Rich's back, easing out the tension, peeling off Rich's undies and one of the highlights is seeing a real close up of Zack rubbing oil into Rich’s ass, such perfect mounds with a sprinkling of hair, Rich has an arse to die for! Rich rolls over and is soon sporting a throbbing hard on which Zack wanks vigorously! Rich then manhandled enough takes back control of his very impressive uncut 9 incher and strokes it to a well sticky climax!
title: Straight Personal Trainer Rich has One Perfect Bubble Butt - Today his First Man Handling & What a Load!
